Level: 3
Category: Other
Time: 1 hour
Component Cost: See below
Market Price: 120 gp
Key Skill: Arcana or Nature or Thievery (no check)

The tethercord is a springlike device with two small exploding packets filled with diluted sovereign glue. This useful device keeps an enemy on a short leash.

Tethercord
Level 3 Uncommon

You fling the device at the enemy; one side sticks to the creature while the other bonds with the ground.

Price: 30 gp
Alchemical Item

Power (Consumable): Standard Action. Make an attack: Ranged 5/10; +6 vs. Reflex; the target cannot move more than 3 squares from the space it occupies when it is hit (save ends).
